Exposure_Definition: the number of hours per day spent viewing TV before and after school; daily number of hours per day spent playing computer games
Covariates_Adjusted: follow-up time; sex; school id; parental education level; parental marital status; smoking status; alcohol intake; BMI; cardiorespiratory fitness

Exposure_Definition: weekly total amount of time spent online during leisure time
Covariates_Adjusted: baseline psychological distress; sex; age; parental educational level; annual family income; grandparental caregiving; physical activity; sleep duration; BMI; and perceived health condition
area disadvantage; ethnicity; maternal education; prior mental health difficulties

Screen_Equipment: Television; video cassettes; computer games; radio
Exposure_Definition: hours of exposure during the last week to each of 4 types of electronic media
Covariates_Adjusted: Sex; age; race; socioeconomic status; maternal educational level; the participants’ marital status and highest level of educational attainment at follow-up
age; gender; parents' divorce; parental education; family income
